data.system_settings: Windows 10 Home x64 & iPhone 7 running iOS 12.0
data.actual_result: The client freezes and the console says it cannot properly read ID of null after a 400 error.
data.expected_result: It should tab you out and return you to the friends list while closing the pop up.
data.short_description: Deleting a server on mobile while being focused on that server freezes the client.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server- Open up the server’s Settings.- Click “Delete Server”- If you see the pop up, delete the server from your mobile device.
